feed.title: Port au Choix - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 5:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:54 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:54 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with flurries beginning after midnight. Local snow squalls south of Plum Point overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm except locally 10 cm south of Plum Point. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:54 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:54 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
